title: StoryGame2 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/OREYO05KA5M < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The StoryGame2 Sound Effects Pack serves as the sequel to 'StoryGame1', delivering an array of sound effects that further enrich RPG, Fantasy, Adventure, Action, Kid, and various other genre game, movie, and animation projects. This pack includes 553 high-quality audio clips that add depth and realism to your projects. Covering a wide range of effects, including Achievement, Action, Coin, Collect, Counter, Crafting, Creak, Door, Gems, Keys, Magic, MagicSpell, Squeak, Treasure, UI, and Whoosh, this pack offers versatile resources to elevate your storytelling experience.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: The pack spans a diverse array of effects suitable for various genres, enhancing the immersive quality of your projects.
  • Stereo and Mono: Audio files are categorized as stereo and mono, offering flexibility to choose between UI effects or location-specific in-game sounds.
  • Versatile Usage: Ideal for adding depth to achievements, actions, interactions, magic, and more in your projects.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D
